name: Taco Wizard Dodge
description:
Hello fellow Tacos! Here is, again, a shooter game, which is not generic, and I worked a lot on it! Follow @madrid2030 for more games! 

=========== 

Today, the Fruit is trying to destroy the world of the Tacos! Remove all Fruit from the Taco World and became the Taco Wizard! 

=========== 

Disclaimer 1 - ***It's really important to eat fruit!

Disclaimer 2 - ***You can't move with up and down keys, or with w and s keys, I know! It's cause in the game you don't need to move with that! 

===========  ~ Features ~ 

> Help Buttom 

>  Credits Buttom 

> Menu blur backdrop 

> Highscore 

> Score counter 

> Famous users detector (@Will_Wam, @griffpatch and @madrid2030 detector, sorry I was too lazy to add more xD) 

> 1.814 Blocks

 ===========  ~ Instructions ~ 

> Move with arrows keys, wasd or mobile friendly! 

> Shoot with spacebar! 

> Avoid Fruit! 

> Collect coins, power ups, and green lives! 

===========
~ Credits ~ 

> Code and Art: @madrid2030 

> Taco Art: @ScratchTeam 

> Intro: @-savior- 

> Score Engine Tutorial: @griffpatch 

===========  ~ Music ~ 

> Super World: @-Xaf- 

> Open Secrets: @-Xaf- 

===========  ~ Power Up and Green Lives ~ 

> Power Up: It changes your skin to Taco Wizard and it gives you +10 points, also it changes the color to fruit! 

> Green Lives: If you have less than 3 lives, it gives you +1 live 

==========
